message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this offer reflects its worth.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making an offer of $12,000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth to me is around $15,000, and I'm willing to make a compromise to reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I can't accept anything below $13,000.  The value this product brings is significant, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.

Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to me is around $15,000.
